title: Attack on tourist hotel : 4 suspects arrested
content: Four suspects have been arrested in connection with the attack on a beach restaurant at Narigama in Hikkaduwa.According to reports, a group of persons had chased away foreign tourists at the restaurant.The suspects had thereafter continued to attack the restaurant, damaging several items.Following is the video footage of the attack that was captured by a tourist who was at the location at the time of the incident.
